Name: Cannon Fire
About the game: Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, in Multiplayer or Split-Screen mode for the best experience. The game uses a low poly artistic style to capture an almost Caribbean setting. The game has different types of ships witch all vary in size, damage, health, and speed. Ship types currently in the game: Galion Warship RPG jetski Multiplayer now available!
Meta Title: Cannon Fire: Mar 19, 2019, Tian Jagodic and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cannon Fire? Check out the release date (Mar 19, 2019), developer insights from Tian Jagodic, and a complete game summary.
